info.name: Cerebellum, tonsil
info.description: The tonsils of the cerebellum are the medial, inferior part of the posterior lobe of each cerebellar hemisphere, adjacent to the medulla and near the foramen magnum. The tonsils are of clinical significance since they may herniate through the foramen magnum with increased intracranial pressure.
